result.execSummary:
The defendant Codie J Campeau was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Codie J Campeau is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Codie J Campeau was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Incident], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office within 60 days or set up payment plan.  Bond to be applied. Balance can be paid through prison wages.  Failure to pay will result in civil judgment.

$100.00 Domestic Abuse surcharge to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office within 60 days or set up payment plan.  Bond to be applied. Balance can be paid through prison wages.  Failure to pay will result in civil judgment.

Subject to Good Time.
NOT subject to Work Release.
Concurrent with: 15CM330 - Counts 1 & 2
08CF411

Must write an apology letter to the victim.
Contact allowed through Probation with regards to child as it relates to counseling.
Must complete a Domestic Violence assessment.
Must complete an Anger Management assessment.
May not possess or use firearms.

#1 - Victim Impact Statement from CVoght

CASES: 15CM13, 15CM206 & 15CM330.  Defendant Codie J Campeau in court with attorney Shelly Tomtschik.  Defendant Codie J Campeau in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 9:15 am.  08CF411-underlying file, agreement will go forward w/ revocation.
15CM206-dismissed.  

15CM330-No amended complaint to be filed.  Count 1-Misd battery, dom, AMENDED striking repeater.  Def-NC plea, Count 2-misd. battery, AMENDED-striking repeater.  Def-NC plea.  CT accepts pleas, adj guilty & judgment entered.  All other counts dismissed.
15CM13-No amended complaint to be filed.  Amend Count 2-misd battery, dom (no repeater).  Def-NC plea.  CT accepts plea, adj guilty & judgment entered.  NO firearms.  Dismiss count 1.

Exh 1-O&R - 15CM13.
SENTENCE:
15CM330-Count 1-No firearms.  6 mo. PCJ concurrent w/ ea. & 08CF411. subj to GT, no WR.  Dom abuse assmt $100.  DNA sample & $200 surcharge.
Counts 1/2 - Dom abuse assmt, complete anger mngmt assmt.  81 days credit.  
Count 2-6 mo. PCJ concurrent w/ ea. & 08CF411. subj to GT, no WR.  DNA sample, no surcharge.

15CM13-Count 2-No firearms. 6 mo, PCJ concurrent w/ ea. & 08CF411 subj to GT, no WR.  Write apology letter to victim.  Contact allowed thru probation with regard to child as relates to counseling.  Must complete anger mngmt & complete domestic violence assmt.  $265.60, 60 dtp or set pp, ftp-judgment.  Dom abuse assmt $100.  PCR.  Bond $ to be applied.  10:04 am adj.  10:08 am-back on the record.  60 dtp or set pp, can be taken out of prison wages.  FTP-judgment.  10:09 am adj.
by ADA Tolan
filed by Atty Tomtschik
